GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingLiabilit.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInTradingSecurities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
IncreaseDecreaseInTradingSecurities.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of investment in debt and equity securities, measured at fair value with changes in fair value recognized in net income.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapa.label: Line of Credit Facility, Current Borrowing Capacity
LineOfCreditFacilityCurrentBorrowingCapa.description: Amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.label: Line of Credit Facility, Interest Rate at Period End
LineOfCreditFacilityInterestRateAtPeriod.description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.label: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
LineOfCreditFacilityMaximumMonthendOutst.description: Maximum month-end amount borrowed under the credit facility during the period.

LossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Loss on Sale of Investments
LossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A loss would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is less than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Loss included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.label: Other Loans Payable, Long-term, Noncurrent
OtherLoansPayableLongTerm.description: Amount of long-term loans classified as other, payable after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashIncome.label: Other Noncash Income
OtherNoncashIncome.description: Amount of income or gain included in net income that result in no cash inflow (outflow), classified as other.

PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.description: The net cash paid (received) associated with the acquisition or disposal of all investments, including securities and other assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherAssetsInvestingAc.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale of other assets recognized in investing activities.

PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment.label: Public Utilities, Property, Plant and Equipment, Accumulated Depreciation
PublicUtilitiesPropertyPlantAndEquipment.description: Period end book value of accumulated depreciation on property, plant and equipment (PPE) that is owned by the regulated operations of the public utility.

AssetsDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleInP.label: Assets Disposed of by Method Other than Sale, in Period of Disposition, Gain (Loss) on Disposition
AssetsDisposedOfByMethodOtherThanSaleInP.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the disposal of an asset through means other than sale, for example, but not limited to, abandonment, spin-off, and expropriation.

AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.label: Assets Held-for-sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, Current
AssetsHeldForSaleNotPartOfDisposalGroupC.description: Amount of assets held-for-sale that are not part of a disposal group, expected to be sold within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AssetsNet.label: Net Assets
AssetsNet.description: The net of assets and liabilities.

BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.label: Business Combination, Contingent Consideration, Asset
BusinessCombinationContingentConsiderati.description: Amount of asset recognized arising from contingent consideration in a business combination.

CommonStockDiscountOnShares.label: Common Stock, Discount on Shares
CommonStockDiscountOnShares.description: Discount on common shares, or any unamortized balance thereof, shown separately as a deduction from the applicable account(s) as circumstances require.

CostMaintenance.label: Cost, Maintenance
CostMaintenance.description: Cost of maintenance incurred and directly related to good produced and service rendered.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.label: Cost, Depreciation
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSoldDepreciation.description: Amount of expense for allocation of cost of tangible asset over its useful life directly used in production of good and rendering of service.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Fee Amount
DebtInstrumentFeeAmount.description: Amount of the fee that accompanies borrowing money under the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

DeferredIncome.label: Deferred Income
DeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

Depletion.label: Depletion
Depletion.description: The noncash expense charged against earnings to recognize the consumption of natural resources.

DepositLiabilitiesAccruedInterest.label: Deposit Liabilities, Accrued Interest
DepositLiabilitiesAccruedInterest.description: Amount of accrued but unpaid interest on deposit liabilities.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Expense (Benefit), Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationShar.description: Amount of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EquipmentExpense.label: Equipment Expense
EquipmentExpense.description: This element represents equipment expense including depreciation, repairs, rentals, and service contract costs. This item also includes equipment purchases which do not qualify for capitalization in accordance with the entity's accounting policy. This item may also include furniture expenses.

ExcessStockSharesIssued.label: Excess Stock, Shares Issued
ExcessStockSharesIssued.description: Number of excess stock shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

GainLossOnSaleOfInterestInProjects.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Interest in Projects
GainLossOnSaleOfInterestInProjects.description: Gain (loss) included in earnings resulting from the sale of interest in projects.

ImpairmentOfOngoingProject.label: Impairment of Ongoing Project
ImpairmentOfOngoingProject.description: Amount recognized as an operating expense or loss during the period to reduce the carrying amount of a project that has been impaired but not abandoned.

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseOthe.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase (Decrease), Other, Net
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseOthe.description: Amount of increase (decrease), classified as other, of the credit facility.

LitigationReserveCurrent.label: Estimated Litigation Liability, Current
LitigationReserveCurrent.description: Carrying amount of reserve for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs, which is expected to be paid within one year of the date of the statement of financial position.

LoansAssumed1.label: Loans Assumed
LoansAssumed1.description: The fair value of loans assumed in noncash investing or financing activities.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtNoncurrent.label: Long-term Debt, Excluding Current Maturities
LongTermDebtNoncurrent.description: Amount after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs of long-term debt classified as noncurrent and excluding amounts to be repaid within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.label: Long-term Debt, Percentage Bearing Fixed Interest, Percentage Rate
LongTermDebtPercentageBearingFixedIntere.description: The interest rate applicable to the portion of the carrying amount of long-term borrowings outstanding as of the balance sheet date, including current maturities, which accrues interest at a set, unchanging rate.

OtherGeneralExpense.label: Other General Expense
OtherGeneralExpense.description: Amount of general expenses not normally included in Other Operating Costs and Expenses.

OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.label: Other Long-term Debt, Current
OtherLongTermDebtCurrent.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other, payable within one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

OtherRestrictedAssetsNoncurrent.label: Other Restricted Assets, Noncurrent
OtherRestrictedAssetsNoncurrent.description: Amount of noncurrent assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedNet.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Owned, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOwnedNet.description: The net amount of long-lived, depreciable flight assets owned by the entity and used in the entity's principle business operations (owned aircraft and capitalized improvements) and capitalized assets classified as property, plant and equipment that are owned by the entity. Excludes assets subject to a capital lease.

SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.label: Sale of Stock, Consideration Received Per Transaction
SaleOfStockConsiderationReceivedPerTrans.description: Amount of consideration received by subsidiary or equity investee in exchange for shares of stock issued or sold. Includes amount of cash received, fair value of noncash assets received, and fair value of liabilities assumed by the investor.

SecurityDeposit.label: Security Deposit
SecurityDeposit.description: The amount of an asset, typically cash, provided to a counterparty to provide certain assurance of performance by the entity pursuant to the terms of a written or oral agreement, such as a lease.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Exercised
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of non-option equity instruments exercised by participants.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Non-Option Equity Instruments, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of equity instruments other than options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested instruments.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.label: Supplemental Deferred Purchase Price
SupplementalDeferredPurchasePrice.description: A device of credit enhancement where a part of the purchase price for the receivable/ payable is retained to serve as a cash collateral.
